00029 #
00030 #  A first version of a set of elliptic cylinders. Already works in the
00031 #  geometry viewer, but still need to run it through the geometry tester. The
00032 #  hard part for that type of geometry is hownear() (requires to solve a 4'th
00033 #  order equation).
00034 #
00035 ###############################################################################
00036 */

00038 
00044 #include "egs_elliptic_cylinders.h"
00045 #include "egs_input.h"
00046 
00047 extern "C" {
00048 
00049 EGS_ELLIPTIC_CYLINDERS_EXPORT
00050 EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00051   // check for valid input
00052     if( !input ) {
00053         egsWarning("createGeometry(elliptic cylinders): null input?\n");
00054         return 0;
00055     }
00056     string type; int err = input->getInput("type",type);
00057     if( err ) {
00058         egsWarning("createGeometry(elliptic cylinders): missing type key\n");
00059         return 0;
00060     }
00061 
00062     // point on cylinder axis
00063     EGS_Vector xo; vector<EGS_Float> Xo;
00064     err = input->getInput("midpoint",Xo);
00065     if( !err && Xo.size() == 3 ) xo = EGS_Vector(Xo[0],Xo[1],Xo[2]);
00066 
00067     // cylinder radii
00068     vector<EGS_Float> x_radii, y_radii;
00069     err = input->getInput("x-radii",x_radii);
00070     if( err ) {
00071         egsWarning("createGeometry(elliptic cylinders): wrong/missing "
00072                 "'x-radii' input\n");
00073         return 0;
00074     }
00075     err = input->getInput("y-radii",y_radii);
00076     if( err ) {
00077         egsWarning("createGeometry(elliptic cylinders): wrong/missing "
00078                 "'y-radii' input\n");
00079         return 0;
00080     }
00081     if( x_radii.size() != y_radii.size() ) {
00082         egsWarning("createGeometry(elliptic cylinders): expecting the same "
00083            "number of x- and y-radii, your input is %d %d\n",
00084            x_radii.size(),y_radii.size());
00085         return 0;
00086     }
00087 
00088     // select geometry
00089     EGS_BaseGeometry *g;
00090     if( type == "EGS_EllipticCylindersXY" )
00091         g = new EGS_EllipticCylindersXY(x_radii,y_radii,xo,"",
00092                 EGS_XProjector("X"),EGS_YProjector("Y"));
00093     else if( type == "EGS_EllipticCylindersXZ" )
00094         g = new EGS_EllipticCylindersXZ(x_radii,y_radii,xo,"",
00095                 EGS_XProjector("X"),EGS_ZProjector("Z"));
00096     else if( type == "EGS_EllipticCylindersYZ" )
00097         g = new EGS_EllipticCylindersYZ(x_radii,y_radii,xo,"",
00098                 EGS_YProjector("Y"),EGS_ZProjector("Z"));
00099     else {
00100         vector<EGS_Float> ax, ay;
00101         err = input->getInput("x-axis",ax);
00102         if( err || ax.size() != 3 ) {
00103             egsWarning("createGeometry(elliptic cylinders): missing/wrong "
00104                     "'x-axis' input\n");
00105             return 0;
00106         }
00107         err = input->getInput("y-axis",ay);
00108         if( err || ay.size() != 3 ) {
00109             egsWarning("createGeometry(elliptic cylinders): missing/wrong "
00110                     "'y-axis' input\n");
00111             return 0;
00112         }
00113         g = new EGS_EllipticCylinders(x_radii,y_radii,xo,"",
00114                 EGS_Projector(EGS_Vector(ax[0],ax[1],ax[2]),"Any"),
00115                 EGS_Projector(EGS_Vector(ay[0],ay[1],ay[2]),""));
00116     }
00117     g->setName(input); g->setMedia(input);
00118     return g;
00119 }
00120 
00121 }
